author: danbev
message:
crypto: add SET_INTEGER_CONSANT macro

This commit introduces a SET_INTEGER_CONSANT macro to reduce some code
duplication in SecureContext::Initialize.

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/23687
